alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:51PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Stillwater, southern Sweet Grass and central Park Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 551 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southeast of Livingston, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Big Timber, Springdale, Mc Leod and Greycliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for south central Montana.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley
